item.title: 5 Best VPN Services in 2026: Tested for Speed, Security & Streaming
item.description: A VPN (Virtual Private Network) encrypts your internet connection and masks your real location. In 2026, with increasing data breaches, ISP tracking, and geo-restrictions, a reliable VPN has become an essential tool for anyone who values online privacy. We tested 23 VPN services over 3 months, measuring real-world speeds across 50+ servers, testing streaming access on 8 platforms, and evaluating security features. Here are our top picks.
